page.title: 09TRANSPORT
page.content: Traffic from Chelmsford to Chipping Ongar used to drive through High Ongar Village,but there were several minor accidents due to lorries shedding there loads on the sharp bends.In 1980 a by-pass (A414) was opened and this changed the village into a peaceful area.It has,however,meant less passing trade.The garage no longer sells petrol and the newspaper shop has closed.There is a bus service connecting High Ongar to Chipping Ongar and Chelmsford.The first bus leaves the village at 6.23am and the last at 7.05pm Monday to Friday.During the day,there can often be a gap of two hours between services.The last bus on a Saturday from Chelmsford is 5.05pm.Therefore it is impossible for local people to rely on public transport for easy access to other towns and villages.
